subject: junit and different jvms
msgSnippet: i have a strange problem. when i run my test suite with oracle s jvm, it works fine. but with hotspot, some of the test cases fail. can anyone plz explain how
messageBody:
i have a strange problem.

when i run my test suite with oracle's jvm, it works fine. but with
hotspot, some of the test cases fail.

can anyone plz explain how junit is integrated with different jvms???
